1446.verse: وَيُحِقُّ ٱللَّهُ|And Allah will establish|169|198|8264$ٱلْحَقَّ|the truth|80|137|436$بِكَلِمَـٰتِهِۦ|by His words,|109|166|7149$وَلَوْ|even if|65|122|179$كَرِهَ|dislike it|73|102|7154$ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ|the criminals."|124|124|7155$

1447.verse: فَمَآ|But none|79|85|132$ءَامَنَ|believed|74|87|111$لِمُوسَىٰٓ|Musa|90|103|8265$إِلَّا|except|65|78|86$ذُرِّيَّةٌ|(the) offspring|116|129|2409$مِّن|among|63|76|53$قَوْمِهِۦ|his people|86|99|5784$عَلَىٰ|for|63|69|52$خَوْفٍ|fear|76|82|8266$مِّن|of|50|62|53$فِرْعَوْنَ|Firaun|93|105|2649$وَمَلَإِيْهِمْ|and their chiefs,|128|140|8267$أَن|lest|44|56|655$يَفْتِنَهُمْ‌ۚ|they persecute them.|164|176|8268$وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|104|713$فِرْعَوْنَ|Firaun|93|111|2649$لَعَالٍ|(was) a tyrant|117|153|8269$فِى|in|48|84|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth,|92|128|100$وَإِنَّهُۥ|and indeed, he|118|154|1195$لَمِنَ|(was) of|76|94|1196$ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ|the ones who commit excesses.|232|232|6111$

1448.verse: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ|And Musa said,|138|146|6653$يَـٰقَوْمِ|"O my people!|112|128|513$إِن|If|44|60|225$كُنتُمْ|you have|81|98|214$ءَامَنتُم|believed|80|96|1242$بِٱللَّهِ|in Allah,|72|88|79$فَعَلَيْهِ|then on Him|99|107|8270$تَوَكَّلُوٓاْ|put your trust,|118|176|8271$إِن|if|44|160|225$كُنتُم|you are|70|186|214$مُّسْلِمِينَ|Muslims."|95|153|6716$

1449.verse: فَقَالُواْ|Then they said,|124|134|4596$عَلَى|"Upon|63|82|52$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|72|606$تَوَكَّلْنَا|we put our trust.|134|153|6611$رَبَّنَا|Our Lord!|81|100|1167$لَا|(Do) not|76|95|30$تَجْعَلْنَا|make us|80|90|6426$فِتْنَةً|a trial|58|149|7216$لِّلْقَوْمِ|for the people -|125|307|8272$ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|the wrongdoers.|128|219|377$

1450.verse: وَنَجِّنَا|And save us|101|123|8273$بِرَحْمَتِكَ|by Your Mercy|116|159|8274$مِنَ|from|50|93|156$ٱلْقَوْمِ|the people -|102|145|2608$ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ|the disbelievers."|133|155|364$

1451.verse: وَأَوْحَيْنَآ|And We inspired|126|136|4642$إِلَىٰ|to|53|74|118$مُوسَىٰ|Musa|83|104|499$وَأَخِيهِ|and his brother|120|140|8275$أَن|that,|53|74|655$تَبَوَّءَا|"Settle|70|90|8276$لِقَوْمِكُمَا|your people|97|107|8277$بِمِصْرَ|in Egypt|84|90|8278$بُيُوتًا|(in) houses,|99|112|6551$وَٱجْعَلُواْ|and make|99|112|8279$بُيُوتَكُمْ|your houses|100|113|8280$قِبْلَةً|(as) places of worship,|172|185|1298$وَأَقِيمُواْ|and establish|107|113|439$ٱلصَّلَوٲةَ‌ۗ|the prayer.|94|164|38$وَبَشِّرِ|And give glad tidings|157|296|237$ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|(to) the believers."|146|216|1964$

1452.verse: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ|And Musa said,|138|148|6653$رَبَّنَآ|"Our Lord!|86|107|1167$إِنَّكَ|Indeed, You|100|121|340$ءَاتَيْتَ|have given|92|113|8281$فِرْعَوْنَ|Firaun|93|114|2649$وَمَلَأَهُۥ|and his chiefs|111|122|8282$زِينَةً|splendor|75|98|8283$وَأَمْوَٲلاً|and wealth|93|139|8284$فِى|in|48|94|89$ٱلْحَيَوٲةِ|the life|82|128|817$ٱلدُّنْيَا|(of) the world.|117|163|818$رَبَّنَا|Our Lord!|81|104|1167$لِيُضِلُّواْ|That they may lead astray|197|213|8285$عَن|from|54|86|1105$سَبِيلِكَ‌ۖ|Your way.|87|119|8286$رَبَّنَا|Our Lord!|81|113|1167$ٱطْمِسْ|Destroy|85|117|8287$عَلَىٰٓ|[on]|63|79|52$أَمْوَٲلِهِمْ|their wealth|99|107|3955$وَٱشْدُدْ|and harden|94|110|8288$عَلَىٰ|[on]|63|79|52$قُلُوبِهِمْ|their hearts,|102|118|66$فَلَا|so (that) not|107|123|208$يُؤْمِنُواْ|they believe|101|117|727$حَتَّىٰ|until|64|72|526$يَرَوُاْ|they see|78|169|8289$ٱلْعَذَابَ|the punishment -|134|316|1442$ٱلْأَلِيمَ|the painful."|100|191|8290$

1443.verse: And Pharaoh said, "Bring to me every learned magician."

1444.verse: So when the magicians came, Moses said to them, "Throw down whatever you will throw."

1445.verse: And when they had thrown, Moses said, "What you have brought is [only] magic. Indeed, Allah will expose its worthlessness. Indeed, Allah does not amend the work of corrupters.

1446.verse: And Allah will establish the truth by His words, even if the criminals dislike it."

1447.verse: But no one believed Moses, except [some] youths among his people, for fear of Pharaoh and his establishment that they would persecute them. And indeed, Pharaoh was haughty within the land, and indeed, he was of the transgressors

1448.verse: And Moses said, "O my people, if you have believed in Allah, then rely upon Him, if you should be Muslims."

1449.verse: So they said, "Upon Allah do we rely. Our Lord, make us not [objects of] trial for the wrongdoing people

1450.verse: And save us by Your mercy from the disbelieving people."

1451.verse: And We inspired to Moses and his brother, "Settle your people in Egypt in houses and make your houses [facing the] qiblah and establish prayer and give good tidings to the believers."

1452.verse: And Moses said, "Our Lord, indeed You have given Pharaoh and his establishment splendor and wealth in the worldly life, our Lord, that they may lead [men] astray from Your way. Our Lord, obliterate their wealth and harden their hearts so that they will not believe until they see the painful punishment."
